name: assetWriter(_:didOutputSegmentData:segmentType:segmentReport:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the asset writer output segment data and a report.
declaration:
optional func assetWriter(_ writer: AVAssetWriter, 
     didOutputSegmentData segmentData: Data, 
              segmentType: AVAssetSegmentType,
